title: december 11: to impeach or not to impeach
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about President Bill Clinton’s impeachment and the affair that preceded it, plus why he never ended up leaving office. Maia also looks back on the rise of ringtones to RIAA legacy. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
